block.p: Dave Anderson closed ''Where Is the Yankees' Real First Baseman?'' (June 7) with: ''Now there is no real Yankee first baseman. And until one arrives, there probably won't be any Yankee World Series rings.'' I find this laughable. The Yankees have an All-Star-caliber player at nearly every position. In terms of payroll, they dwarf other teams. There's no level playing field when it comes to the Yankees. But other teams have somehow won the World Series with much less.
